Text: RE Expert Systems Textual MiningVince Well take a look Original Message From Kaminski Vince J Sent Monday June AM To Tholan Scott Subject FW Expert Systems Textual Mining Scott Please take a look at it You may find it useful Vince Original Message From Kolodgie Jim Sent Friday June PM To Kaminski Vince J Cc Perlman Beth Wasaff George Subject Expert Systems Textual Mining Vince Enclosed is information on textual mining and expert systems I spoke to you about in the lobby EDS is currently providing commercial applications using experts systems and textual mining to derive value for our customers The presentation below has two examples of current applications It seems to me that there a multiple applications for this type of program within Enron which would have short payback periods Please let me know if you wish to investigate further File Text Mining TLG vppt Cheers Jim Kolodgie EDS Client Executive Enron Smith St EB Houston Texas w c

Thank YouNow that Ive healed from the mile biking experience I wanted to thank you for your generous donation put towards the sponsorship of my MS HoustonAustin bicycle ride It was much appreciated and the money all goes to a good and worthy cause Contrary to my initial gut impulse the money did not go to the Scott Tholan New Bike Fund Seriously though thanks for your support Next year you ride too Scott PS I recently sent in your check and it should be deposited by the MS organization in the next several days
